name: Among Feathers and Swords
description:
Still very jank and broken!

CONTROLS:

[ E ] - INTERACT

[ F ] - PICKUP

[ SPACE ] - DODGE ROLL

[ LEFT MOUSE ] LIGHT AND HEAVY ATTACK (Tap or Hold)
[ RIGHT MOUSE ] BLOCK

[ SHIFT ] SPRINT

[ GAMEPLAY ]

You get souls by slaying foes, and using them to unlock campfires.
When you do so, you get more max HP and Stamina.

Multiple unique weapons can be found around the game world.
Drinking Tea advances time.

Heavy attacks break through blocks.

Dodges have Invincible frames.
